release.action: Added additional documentation on how to use the *new* DataBindingTemplate.
Changed the way a mapping file location is provided (please see HOW-TO).
Added several properties to the CastorUnmarshallerFactoryBean so that it is possible to fine-tune the instantiated Unmarshaller instance through the Spring beans definitions (rather than code).
